title: FT Bender No Trees Piedmont Factory 42
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: FT Bender No Trees Piedmont Factory 42
posts.post_content:
Hello I have this very nice Bender No Trees Piedmont Factory 42 in a PSA 4 .  I am looking to trade it for another rare or semi rare back PSA HOF. I am interested in cards with backs other than Piedmont and Sweet Caporal .The Bender's value I believe is around 1,200.00 but I may be a bit high or low. At this point it is for trade not for sale. Below are the cards I would be interested in trading for in a PSA 4 or above .  I want the value to be equal or will except cash or pay depending on the card I am trading for
Brown Portrait
Brown Cubs Shirt
Clarke Portrait
Jennings Portrait
Joss Portrait
Mathewson Portrait/ and White Cap
Marquard Portrait
McGraw Portrait No Cap
Speaker
Waddell Portrait
Young Bare Hand

Thanks for looking and let me know what you have
